name: Rupa Devi
about: I have worked extensively in User centered design, Visual design, that adhere to standards and best practices. Experienced in designing for desktop, Mobile devices, Tablet, and web applications, from conceptualization to detailed user interface and navigation design. Have thorough knowledge of web and mobile design/ux principals; graphic design, layout, typography, color, icon development, corporate identity & branding. As a UX Designer my role involves conceptualizing, wireframing and designing attractive User Interfaces and creating web/ mobile applications and websites that conform to Usability Standards. Specialties: Design Skills: Requirement Gathering, Competitor Analysis, Heuristics Review, Persona Study, User Experience Flow, Usability Testing, Information Architecture, Content Inventory, Content Map, Interface & Interaction Design, Work Flow, Wireframes, Storyboarding, Prototyping, Visual Design & Documentation Technical Tools: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Fireworks, Axure, Microsoft Visio, Balsamiq, Fundamentals of Programming & HTML

activities.title: Imagine having 50 apps for ordering food. Sounds hectic right? Then why do that for your money? :-p #ForAllThingsMoney
A little more than three years have passed since I began working at Freshworks, and since last week was my work anniversary, I thought it would be…

recommendations: Chandrasekar G “Rupa Devi is a highly skilled product designer, She understands nitty-gritty details of the product and adds a lot of contextual values into the product. She was involved in creating a reporting platform and took ownership of the design. Rupa Devi is extremely responsive and has quick turnaround time whenever we asked for help and deliverables. She is extremely open to feedback and down to earth person”

LinkedIn User “I have had a chance to work with RUpa on multiple complex projects like workflow editor and others. Her work quality and ethic had been great. Her ability to understand and design for complex use cases while delivering it in a simple and delightful package is commendable. She is hard-working, easy to work with and had been a real asset to our team at Freshworks”
